code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import userReducer from"./reducers/userReducer";import uiReducer from"./reducers/uiReducer";var initialState={};var middleware=[thunk];var reducers=combineReducers({user:userReducer,UI:uiReducer});var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(reducers,initialState,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware)));export default store;
